## Interesting Articles 
The following are things that I found thought provoking in my reading about AI. 

1. [Machines of Loving Grace](https://darioamodei.com/essay/machines-of-loving-grace) By Dario Amodei 
- Dario Amodei's take on how AI Could Transform the World for the Better

2. [The Adolescnce of Technology](https://darioamodei.com/essay/the-adolescence-of-technology) By Dario Amodei 
- Dario Amodei's take on Confronting and Overcoming the Risks of Powerful AI

3. [Something Big is Happening](https://x.com/mattshumer_/status/2021256989876109403?s=42) By Matt Schumer
- Matt Schumer makes a case comparing he current moment to the weeks before Covid-19
- This take in my opinion is overly alarmist

The perspectives represented here do not necessarily reflect my opinions.
